author: Bruce Fox
content:
I had heard that quote, and may have used it myself a few times. So I got a copy of Thucydides Peloponnesian War and read the whole thing, looking for the quote. I was disappointed that I couldn’t find it. I felt that I had missed something, that I wasn’t looking in the right place or who knows what. I did scale back my use of the quote because I couldn’t prove it. Couldn’t drag out the book and give you chapter and verse (as it were).
“The Peloponnesian War” has much to recommend it. l might take another look.
So thanks. I feel much better now.
Regards, Fox sends.

Bruce Fox, CAPT USNR-RET
